markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Limited">[Inkshot](/Spells.aspx?ID=1229)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 46</row>

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

A spray of viscous, toxic ink jets from your fingertip to strike a target creature in the face. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 2d6 poison damage, plus you blast the target's eyes, making them [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round as the stinging ink blurs and distorts the creature's vision. On a critical hit, double the poison damage, and the target becomes dazzled for 1 minute by the foul ink. 

The ink stain remains for 1 hour before fading, although vigorous cleansing (or magic such as a [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229) cantrip) can remove the ink before then.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the base poison damage by 2d6.
name: Inkshot

Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 2d6 poison damage, plus you blast the target's eyes, making them dazzled for 1 round as the stinging ink blurs and distorts the creature's vision. On a critical hit, double the poison damage, and the target becomes dazzled for 1 minute by the foul ink. The ink stain remains for 1 hour before fading, although vigorous cleansing (or magic such as a prestidigitation cantrip) can remove the ink before then. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the base poison damage by 2d6.
